citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15 pm on 09-JAN-
2023.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 1:15 pm and knocked on the door to the house, honked the car horn, called the
phone number and left a message, and then waited 30 minutes. The inspector then left the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15 pm on 09-JAN-
2023. 
 
The inspector arrived at the facility at 1:15 pm and knocked on the door to the house, honked the car horn, called the 
phone number and left a message, and then waited 30 minutes.  The inspector then left the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
